item.title: Debug Terraform (Azure Devops) Provider with VSCode
item.description: Introduction In an effort to save someone the pain of having to go through what I did when trying to get debugging to work on the Terraform Azure Devops Provider acceptance tests, here’s the solution.

item.title: Testing terraform with Pester
item.description: In this post I’d like show how you can create integrations tests for terraform with Pester, a PowerShell testing framework.
